page.title: 19Other Ardington Businesses
page.content:
Mr.David Buzzard set up Ardington Gallery to show work of local artists, to sell artists material,and to provide a picture framing service.The firm will undertake the cleaning and mounting of watercolours,oils,photographs,collages, needleworks and 3 dimensional objects.
Mr.Bill Thom runs Ardington Butchery, making sausages,beefburgers and brawn and cooking and selling meat and some meat and fruit pies.He also sells meat for home freezers.
Electro Medical Accessories Ltd is a small family business which assembles electrodes for medical use.They also supply accessories such as recording paper,inks and creams and gels for Electrocardiography.Mrs Christine Lisi was the first person brought up on Lockinge Estate to start a business.
